EmailTemplate.name: Release Invoice
EmailTemplate.subject: Your order for PO (Cust.PO#) has shipped out
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!inscor__Release__c.inscor__Customer_Vendor__c},
Your order under PO (Cust. PO#) has shipped out. SAS (SO#); {!inscor__Release__c.Name}
Attached is a copy of the shipment documents. Your Tracking No# is {!inscor__Release__c.inscor__AWB__c}. Shipped Via (Ship Via). SAS Invoice # {!inscor__Release__c.inscor__Invoice_Number__c}.
We appreciate your business. Your after-sales support person will be (SO Assigned to), (Email of SO Assigned to). Please also CC customersupport@seattleav.com.
https://seattleav.force.com/inventoryportal/s/?param={!inscor__Release__c.GUID__c}
-- Best Regards
Shipping
Direct:
+1 (425) 448-5005 Ext: 702
Office:
